comments.author: Stefan Guggisberg
comments.body:
fixed in svn r370144

added optional "maxIdleTime" attribute to "Workspaces" element in repository.xml;
the "maxIdleTime" attribute specifies the maximum amount of time in  seconds 
before an idle workspace is automatically shutdown.

idle workspaces won't be automatically shutdown if maxIdleTime is not specified or 
if it is zero.

summary: provide option to automatically dispose idle workspaces
